TowerDefensePotential.1030101.2: Increases ATK gradually while casting Auto Attacks. Resets upon dealing the Skill.
TowerDefensePotential.1030102.2: When casting a skill, every target killed charges the skill, up to 50%.
TowerDefensePotential.1030103.2: After casting a skill, Auto Attacks become AoE Attacks for a period of time.
TowerDefensePotential.1030104.2: When casting a skill, generates a phantom of Amber that spins and shoots at the target's location.
TowerDefensePotential.1100102.2: Reduces the duration of clones but significantly increases ATK.
TowerDefensePotential.1100103.2: Summons an extra clone on the field every few seconds.
TowerDefensePotential.1100104.2: When a clone vanishes, it deals Self-Destruct DMG in a small area.
TowerDefensePotential.1110101.2: Increases the attack frequency and Skill DMG of Glacier Array.
TowerDefensePotential.1110102.2: Increases the max stack limit of the slowing effect of Glacier Array. Upon reaching the max stack limit, freezes the target.
TowerDefensePotential.1110103.2: Increases the range of Glacier Array.
TowerDefensePotential.1110104.2: When casting Glacier Array, delivers an iceberg strike that deals additional DMG and stuns the target.
TowerDefensePotential.1120101.2: When casting a skill, unleashes sword auras that pierce through the enemy.
TowerDefensePotential.1120102.2: When dealing DMG with Auto Attacks, there is a chance to unleash multiple sword auras at the target's location. This effect can only be triggered once every 5s.
TowerDefensePotential.1120103.2: Adds a second phase: Devastating Wind.
TowerDefensePotential.1120104.2: Adds a second phase: Dragon Slash.
TowerDefensePotential.1180101.2: The skill has a stronger pull effect, increasing the DMG dealt from breaking the chains.
TowerDefensePotential.1180102.2: Increases the skill's targeting range. A Shadow Scythe is thrown with the horizontal sweep, and the first few enemies hit will also be chained and pulled back.
TowerDefensePotential.1180103.2: When the skill's chains bind 3 or fewer targets, performs one powerful horizontal slash and inflicts prolonged Vulnerability on them.
TowerDefensePotential.1180104.2: When the skill's chains bind 3 or more targets, significantly increasing the DMG dealt from breaking the chains.
TowerDefensePotential.1230101.2: Ann's third Auto Attack can also trigger Wind Burst.
TowerDefensePotential.1230102.2: Increases the ATK SPD of Bubble.
TowerDefensePotential.1230103.2: Increases the effectiveness of Wind Burst's Weight Reduction and its duration.
TowerDefensePotential.1230104.2: Bubble fires lasers as Auto Attacks, knocking back targets and inflicting Weight Reduction on them.
TowerDefensePotential.1270101.2: Additional effect of Tidal Domain: increases the ATK SPD of squadmates within the Tidal Domain.
TowerDefensePotential.1270102.2: Additional effect of Tidal Domain: When a squadmate within the Tidal Domain deals DMG, there is a chance to generate a fountain at the target's location that deals DMG and a slight knockback. This effect can only be triggered once every 3s.
TowerDefensePotential.1270103.2: Increases the duration of Tidal Domain.
TowerDefensePotential.1270104.2: Additional effect of Tidal Domain: increases the range and DMG of Teresa's waves, knocking back targets slightly.
TowerDefensePotential.1330101.2: The skill has a stronger push effect and deals increased DMG.
TowerDefensePotential.1330102.2: The skill deals damage while inflicting Vulnerability.
TowerDefensePotential.1330104.2: Significantly increases the skill's attack range.
TowerDefensePotential.1340101.2: When casting a skill, becomes encircled by fire, dealing DMG over time.
TowerDefensePotential.1340102.2: After casting a skill, increases ATK SPD for a period of time.
TowerDefensePotential.1340103.2: Increases the skill's punches to 9 times.
TowerDefensePotential.1340104.2: Accumulates "Paw Prints" every time an Auto Attack deals damage. When casting a skill, increases its Skill DMG according to the number of stacks of "Paw Prints" and consumes them all.
TowerDefensePotential.1560101.2: Increases the penguin plushie's Explosion DMG. When the penguin plushie stops, it pounces on the target.
TowerDefensePotential.1560102.2: Upon exploding, the penguin plushie inflicts Vulnerability on the target.
TowerDefensePotential.1560103.2: Increases the penguin plushie's size and Explosion DMG. Enhances the Vulnerability effect it inflicts.
TowerDefensePotential.1560104.2: The penguin plushie dances longer on the battlefield, dealing DMG over time to targets around it and inflicting Vulnerability.
